title: KATE 4.5MM ROUND CUT, SILVER RIVIÈRE  NECKLACE
description: Introducing our largest stone size Kate, the 4.5MM Kate rivière necklace (formally Kate Collar). No longer reserved for evening events, our Kate rivière necklace in gold makes a striking comeback as an everyday staple. Crafted with 27cts of round-cut white sapphires, the Kate rivière collar sits perfectly above the collarbone.
details:
Metal: Sterling silver
Setting: 4-prong
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round cut
Stone Size: 4.5MM



15 inches, 27.00 CTW DEW

What is Lab-Grown?
